english.segment1: The silence of whats left is waking me, I never sleep. And what was here before is fading fast. And now its gone away, away
english.segment2: So I can pray this all will end. Take it a million miles away. I cant go through this again. Youre my only hope
english.segment3: The deepest parts of me are crying out for something more. Blind reality has lead me here. Have I thrown it all away, away.
